subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Polish world champion Anita Wlodarczyk broke her own women’s hammer world record with a throw of 256 feet 11 inches (78.30 meters) in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
snippet: The Polish world champion Anita Wlodarczyk broke her own women’s hammer world record with a throw of 256 feet 11 inches (78.30 meters) in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
